suite.name: DjangoAdminSiteTestSuite

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: /home/hakan/Python/Robot/robot-fw-seleniumlibrary-tests/Results/geckodriver-24.log

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To Admin Login Page
kw.doc: Goes to Admin Login Page specified by admin_login_page_url. It waits until the page's login button is enabled. Once the login button is loaded, it checks title_text, username_text, password_text, and login_button_text for correctness. :return: None
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@id="site-name"]/a' contains exact text 'Django administration'.

kw.name: Login
kw.doc: Logins as admin user via admin login page. If the login attempt is successful, user is redirected to admin main page. This test checks the success of the login attempt by waiting for 'logout' element in the main page. If the element is enabled, then the url of of the redirected page is checked against expected_admin_main_page_url. Then the test verifies all the texts and the links on the admin main page :return: None
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Verify Admin Main Page
kw.doc: If the login attempt is successful, user is redirected to admin main page. This test checks the success of the login attempt by waiting for 'logout' element in the admin main page. If the element is enabled, then the url of of the redirected page is checked against expected_admin_main_page_url. Then the test verifies all the texts and the links on the admin main page :return: None
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@id="site-name"]/a' contains exact text 'Django administration'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="user-tools"]' contains exact text 'WELCOME, HAKAN. VIEW SITE / CHANGE PASSWORD / LOG OUT'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="user-tools"]/a[1]' contains exact text 'VIEW SITE'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="user-tools"]/a[2]' contains exact text 'CHANGE PASSWORD'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="user-tools"]/a[3]' contains exact text 'LOG OUT'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="content"]/h1' contains exact text 'Site administration'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="content-main"]/div[1]/table/caption/a' contains exact text 'AUTHENTICATION AND AUTHORIZATION'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="content-main"]/div[2]/table/tbody/tr/th/a' contains exact text 'Blog posts'.
looking for Add buttons with XPATH = //div[@id="content-main"]//a[contains(., 'Add')]
looking for Change buttons with XPATH = //div[@id="content-main"]//a[contains(., 'Change')]
Verifying element '//div[@id="recent-actions-module"]/h2' contains exact text 'Recent actions'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="recent-actions-module"]/h3' contains exact text 'My actions'.

kw.name: Click On Add Group Button
kw.doc: In admin_main_page, it clicks on add_group button, once redirected to the add_group_page :return None

kw.name: Verify Add Group Page
kw.doc: In admin_main_page, it clicks on add_group button, once redirected to the add_group_page. Once redirection occurs, this method checks for element title to be visible on add_group_page. Then it verifies that current url is expected_add_group_page_url It then verifies the page's texts and the links for correctness :return: None
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@id="container"]/div[2]' contains exact text 'Home › Authentication and Authorization › Groups › Add group'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="content"]/h1' contains exact text 'Add group'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="group_form"]/div/fieldset/div[2]/div/div[1]/div/div[1]/h2' contains exact text 'Available permissions'.

Verifying element '//*[@id="id_permissions_from"]' contains exact text 'admin | log entry | Can add log entry admin | log entry | Can change log entry admin | log entry | Can delete log entry auth | group | Can add group auth | group | Can change group auth | group | Can delete group auth | permission | Can add permission auth | permission | Can change permission auth | permission | Can delete permission auth | user | Can add user auth | user | Can change user auth | user | Can delete user contenttypes | content type | Can add content type contenttypes | content type | Can change content type contenttypes | content type | Can delete content type postings | blog post | Can add blog post postings | blog post | Can change blog post postings | blog post | Can delete blog post sessions | session | Can add session sessions | session | Can change session sessions | session | Can delete session'.

Verifying element '//*[@id="id_permissions_add_all_link"]' contains exact text 'Choose all'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="group_form"]/div/fieldset/div[2]/div/div[2]' contains exact text 'Hold down "Control", or "Command" on a Mac, to select more than one.'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="group_form"]/div/fieldset/div[2]/div/div[1]/div/div[2]/h2' contains exact text 'Chosen permissions'.

Element '//*[@id="group_form"]/div/fieldset/div[2]/div/div[1]/div/div[2]/h2/span' attribute 'title' contains value 'This is the list of chosen permissions. You may remove some by selecting them in the box below and then clicking the "Remove" arrow between the two boxes.'.
Verifying element '//*[@id="id_permissions_remove_all_link"]' contains exact text 'Remove all'.
Element '//*[@id="group_form"]/div/div/input[2]' attribute 'value' contains value 'Save and add another'.
Element '//*[@id="group_form"]/div/div/input[3]' attribute 'value' contains value 'Save and continue editing'.

kw.name: ${permision} = postings | blog post | Can add blog post
Enter Search Term In Available Permissions Filter
kw.msg: Typing text 'postings | blog post | Can add blog post' into text field '//*[@id="id_permissions_input"]'.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Choose All Filtered Permissions
kw.doc: Given that a search term is entered into input_permission_field, the available_permissions_dropdown lists filtered permissions. This method creates a list of all the filtered permissions. Then it selects each and every element in filtered_permissions_elements. Then it clicks on choose_all_permissions_option. It then verifies that the permissions are added inside chosen_permissions_dropdown. :return: None
kw.msg: ['postings | blog post | Can add blog post']
Pressing special key CONTROL to element.
{'postings | blog post | Can add blog post'}
{'postings | blog post | Can add blog post'}

suite.doc: This is a test suite for admin login page
